Package com.example.StudentManagement.controller

Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
com.example.StudentManagement.controller.StaffController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/staff") public class StaffController extends Object
The StaffController class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to staff operations. It uses services and repositories to perform operations such as login, activation, password recovery, and fetching staff and student information.
Author:
Shuyi Yang, Yangcheng Liu

    • studentLogin

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> studentLogin(@RequestBody Staff staff)
      Handles staff login requests.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object containing login credentials.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the login result.

    • active

      Activates a staff account.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object containing activation details.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the activation result.

    • forgetPasswd

      Handles password recovery for staff.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object containing details for password recovery.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the password recovery result.

    • getStaffInfo

      @GetMapping("/getStaffInfo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Staff> getStaffInfo(@RequestParam("username") String userID)
      Retrieves information for a specific staff member by their username.
      Parameters:
      userID - The username of the staff member.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the staff information if found, or a NOT_FOUND status.

      studentID - The ID of the student.

      @GetMapping("/getAssignedStuInfo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Student>> getAssignedStuInfo(@RequestParam("username") String tutorID)
      Retrieves a list of students assigned to a specific tutor by their tutor ID.

    • markCoursework

      @PostMapping("/markCoursework") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> markCoursework(@RequestBody Coursework coursework)
      Marks a coursework grade for a student.
      Parameters:
      coursework - The Coursework object containing details of the coursework to be marked.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the result of marking the coursework.
